data.message: Best Facebook Moment of 2010 from Mari Eaton McCullough: "December 14, 2009, my son left for Marine Corps boot camp at Parris Island and over the 13 weeks of boot I met a number of parents whose boys were in the same training. We all hooked up on Facebook and have developed a never-ending friendship… If it wasn't for FB I do not know how I would survive…" Read more and share your story at  http://ow.ly/3qpJi.
